GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.25 to before v5.4.128
GSD.description:
can: bcm: fix infoleak in struct bcm_msg_head

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.128 by commit c297559a2a2a6b6f0de61ed333a978a118b0e660, it was introduced in version v2.6.25 by commit ffd980f976e7fd666c2e61bf8ab35107efd11828. For more details please see the references link.
